title: Webster man indicted, arrested for allegedly setting Southbridge fire that displaced 12 families
author: Darin Zullo
bullets: Crime The Webster man was charged with two counts each of arson of a dwelling and malicious damage to a motor vehicle.
A Webster man was indicted and arrested for allegedly setting a Southbridge fire that displaced 12 families.

Southbridge Fire Department By Darin Zullo September 28, 2025 | 10:50 AM 1 minute to read A Webster man was arrested Thursday after being indicted for allegedly setting a fire that tore through two multi-family homes and displaced 12 families, according to officials.

title: Newton psychologist to plead guilty to fraud, money laundering, allegedly fell victim to scam
author: Darin Zullo
bullets: Crime The Newton psychologist allegedly invested $600,000 of his patient’s money overseas after falling victim to a confidence scam.
